[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_dark=”yes” wn_bg_color=”#282828″ css=”.vc_custom_1483344317752{margin-top: -120px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text][vc_row row_dark=”yes” wn_bg_color=”#282828″ css=”.vc_custom_1483344317752{margin-top: -120px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

From Lead Pastor, Rev. Tony Kiamah

Hello and welcome to our church website, it’s always a real joy for us to meet and have new members in our church family. Here you will find useful information about our belief.

To help our members connect more with the church, we have home fellowships, refresher group, where members get to meet weekly and study the Bible. It is in these refresher groups that we also get to learn on the wellbeing of our members therefore making it easier for us to meet their needs the best way we can.

Here are some of the refresher groups and contact persons

  • Buruburu – 072244116, Charles Kanyeki
  • Sabaki Athi River – 0720388588, Kevin Odero
  • ABC Waiyaki Way – 0733906810, Pst Muturi
  • Kahawa West – 073387925, Esther Mbaka
  • Kangundo Road – 0711945453, Douglas Lukalo
  • ParkCourt Parklands – 0722772383, Margaret Ayisi
  • South B – 0720544285, Philip & Nyabanda
  • Spring Valley – 0724646095, Etinick Mutinda
  • Mwimuto – 0720352748, Michael Okumu
  • Kileleshwa – 0721263808, Sam & Phanice Miya
  • Thome – 0722804567, Regina Mukami
  • Kikuyu – 0720993282, Moses Kirika

Incase you do not find a refresher group that is not near where you stay, kindly call us on 0721274487, and we shall advice.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1642758787719{background-color: #50899a !important;}”]SUNDAY SERVICES

SERVICE
VENUE
TIME
First Service Main Sanctuary 6:00am – 7:00am
Second Service Main Sanctuary 7:00am – 8:20am
ThirdService Main Sanctuary 9:00am – 10:20am
Fourth Service Main Sanctuary 11:00am – 12:20pm
Youth Service Youth Sanctuary 11:00am – 12:20pm
Teens Service Teens Sanctuary 11:00am – 12:20pm
Children’s Service Children’s Center 9:00am & 11:00am
Young Adults 6-7class Thursday 5:30pm

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″ css=”.vc_custom_1480754956343{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 1% !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 19% !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row layer_animation=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1485762036008{background-color: #f8f8f8 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1480770397552{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Our Location

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1480750708632{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 8% !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Benefits of Church Membership

  1. Join and participate in ministry.
  2. Support for social events and relief funds for members.
  3. Free Pastoral visitation  and immediate both home and hospital.
  4. Baby Dedication.
  5. Enjoy special discounted rates for the use of church facilities for private events.
  6. Support during bereavement, distress, illness and other catastrophes.
  7. Participation and Voting at Church Annual General Meeting.
  8. Issuance of a card as proof of membership.
  9. Issuance of letters of recommendations as may be required.
  10. Eligibility for appointment or election into leadership position within the Church.
  11. Accountability within the Body of Christ.
  12. Sense of belonging to a community.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
